item.description:
Trattoria Il Panino (http://www.trattoriailpanino.com/) has been in business for 25 years in Boston's North End. It's billed as the city's first original trattoria. They serve the earthy Mediterranean cuisine of the Amalfi Coast. There are many pastas and house specialties to choose from. Appetizers run $11.95-15.95, salads $7.95, pastas $13.95-19.95 and entrees $20.95-29.95.

If you're coming from the Greenway, walk down Hanover Street and take the first left onto Parmenter. It's a 5-minute walk from Haymarket Station and the Parcel 7 Garage, which is above the station. When you get to the restaurant, walk downstairs and join us for a glass of wine or Prosecco before 7:00. Please bring cash, as we won't be getting separate checks.Â So join us in the festive North End for our annual holiday dinner. Thanks.

IMPORTANT: Please see our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.name: Trattoria Il Panino-Holiday Dinner
